desc: Thunder can be heard from 10 miles away, but lightning can strike from 25 miles away. TALOS lightning detector detects lightning up to 25 miles. Audible & visual alerts to incoming and outgoing storms. Stay safe and protected while outdoors.

layout.text: One Lightning Strike Can Change Your Life Forever
74% of Lightning Survivors Have Some Form of Disability. Get The Loudest & Brightest Alerts on the Market with TALOS Products.
